participant_1.name: Lily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Lily is a passionate and outgoing country music singer with a love for nature and adventure.
participant_1.background: i am a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks. my favorite band is rascal flats.

participant_2.name: Jake Miller
participant_2.personality: Jake is an adventurous and friendly mechanical engineer who enjoys outdoor activities and spending time with family.
participant_2.background: i've a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.
